name: Thingweb
tagline: exploratory implementations for the Web of Things
body:
## What is Thingweb about?
Thingweb aims to be an exploratory implementation of both the WoT Model discussed in the W3C WoT IG and a RESTful HATEOAS based approach as discussed in the IRTF T2T PRG.
It is simply a toolkit with some demo applications enabling you to create and experiment with WoT applications.

### Facts

* MIT licenced
* Java 8
* target platforms are Desktop, mobile and Raspberry Pi- level ÂµC

### Download latest build

We use [drone.io](https://drone.io) as build server, the builds can be accessed [here](https://drone.io/github.com/thingweb/thingweb/files)

### Source

Hosted on [github](https://github.com/thingweb/thingweb)
